{{Merge from |Playhouse Disney (Greece)|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = Disney Junior | logofile = | logosize = | owner = [[The Walt Disney Company]] | network = Disney Channel (Greece)
(8.30 a.m. till 10:00 a.m) [[GR]] | country = [[Greece]] | language = [[Greek language|Greek]], [[English language|English]] | broadcast area = [[Greece]]
[[Cyprus]] | former names = Playhouse Disney
(until June 1, 2011) | network = [[Disney Channel Greece]] | picture format = [[4:3]] ([[576i]], [[SDTV]]) | slogan = Imagine and Learn (2009-2011)
Where the magic begins (2011-present) | launch = November 7, 2009 (As Playhouse Disney)
June 1, 2011 (As Disney Junior) | web = [http://www.disney.gr/disney-junior Disney Junior Greece] | sat serv 1 = [[NOVA Greece]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 504 | sat serv 2 = [[NOVA Cyprus]] | sat chan 2 = Channel 404 | cable serv 1 = [[Cablenet]] | adsl serv 1 = [[Conn-x TV]] | adsl chan 1 = Channel 51 | adsl serv 2 = [[CytaVision]] | adsl chan 2 = Channel 7 }} '''Disney Junior''' is a television block that airs on [[Disney Channel (Greece)|Disney Channel Greece]] from 8.30 a.m. till 10:00 a.m [[GR]] and in weekends from 6 a.m. till 07:30 a.m [[GR]]. It is available in [[English language|English]] And [[Greek language|Greek]]. It replaced [[Playhouse Disney (Greece)|Playhouse Disney]]. ==Programming== *''[[Handy Manny]]'' *''[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]]'' *''[[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]]'' *''[[Special Agent Oso]]'' ==Website== Unlike the Playhouse Disney Website , Disney Junior Has a website in [[Greek language|Greek]]. ==Availability== *In Greece it is available on [[NOVA Greece]] and [[Conn-x TV]]. *In Cyprus it is available on [[NOVA Cyprus]], [[Cytavision]] and [[Cablenet]]. ==Competitors== The main competitor was [[Nick Jr. (Greece)]] block on Nickelodeon . ==See also== *[[Disney Channel (Greece)]] *[[Disney XD (Greece)]] *[[Playhouse Disney (Greece)]] ==External links == [http://www.disney.gr/disney-junior Disney Junior Greece] {{Disney Channel}} {{Television in Greece}} [[Category:Television channels in Greece]]
